Name: Chess: The Lost Pieces
About the game: Chess: The Lost Pieces The chess game with deck building. Use unique pieces such as, - a pawn that needs to be charged to move , - a rook that can pull pieces from afar , - a knight that gets more mobile the longer it stays on the board , - a bishop that moves off the board and ends up on the other side, - a queen that captures its capturer when it get gets captured , or - a king that can swap places with its queen or queen class piece! Roguelike Chess - Start with a rook, a knight and a bishop, build a full army deck as you go! - Progress through the map, recruit new pieces and beat ppponents! - Use bottled pieces to get a material advantage! Features: - Use 30+ new and unique chess pieces to defeat opponents - Make your own chess piece deck , and battle against friends or strangers - A randomised roguelike story mode to unlock even more pieces - 30 puzzles with the new pieces to sharpen your skills - ...and Online Play so you can get get beaten by your friends!
